pageContext.claim: “Our primary competitor, very big, powerful competitor has lost $17 trillion since our election.”
pageContext.analysis: It's unclear why Trump claims China's net worth has declined by $17 trillion. China's net worth was $29 trillion in 2017, and it is projected to grow to $39 trillion by 2022. If Trump is referring to stock market value, the Shanghai Stock Exchange Composite Index is basically flat since Trump took the oath of office. The index achieved a high in June 2016, but it fell sharply before Trump became president or any of his tariffs were implemented.
